content.text: Once you're logged in, you can browse through the list of available restaurants on the Eatly website. You can filter by cuisine, price, and distance to find the perfect restaurant for your needs. Click on a restaurant to view its menu.

Each order goes through multiple stages: processing, out for delivery, and delivered. Understanding these statuses will help you track your order effectively.
Once your order is dispatched, you will receive a tracking link via SMS or email. This link provides real-time updates on your orderâ€™s location.
If you face any issues tracking your order, contact customer support for immediate assistance.
Go to the payment settings and select 'Add New Card'. Enter your card details securely.
Choose a preferred payment method by setting a default card for transactions.
Ensure that your card information is kept safe by using two-factor authentication and monitoring transactions regularly.

A strong focus on customer satisfaction can greatly improve business success.

faqs.question: How long does delivery take?
faqs.answer: Delivery times vary depending on your location and the restaurant's processing time. Typically, it takes between 30 to 60 minutes.

faqs.question: How Does It Work?
faqs.answer: Simply place an order through our website or mobile app, choose your preferred restaurant, select your items, and proceed to checkout. We handle the rest!

faqs.question: How does your food delivery service work?
faqs.answer: Our platform connects you with local restaurants. Once you place an order, the restaurant prepares your food, and a delivery partner brings it to your doorstep.

faqs.question: What payment options do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and digital wallets like Apple Pay and Google Pay.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts or promotions?
faqs.answer: Yes! We frequently offer promotions and discounts. Keep an eye on our website or subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated.
